short_summary: The GCC Pitot Static Head Portable Test Sets are part of testing equipment used to measure UAV flight performance. This project proposes building of 120 such test sets within one year.

full_summary:
### Tender Announcement - RMSO Kitchen Systems Maintenance
____________________________________________________________________________

#### Government Tender Announcement - OSPEN
================================================================================================================================================================

**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer (Standing Offer)
**Solicitation Number:** WS3863230888
**Publication Date:** August 4, 2023

#### Tender Details
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

* **Tender Title:** EC095-230011 RMSO Kitchen Systems Maintenance
* **Tender Reference Number:** WS3863230888-Doc3931749557
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Tender Status:** Expired
* **Procurement Category:** Service RWA (SRV)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selected Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Andrew MacFarlane (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ E-mail: [andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Tender Description
------------------------------------------------------------------------

Public Services and Procurement Canada, Atlantic Region, requires a Standing Offer to provide Kitchen System Maintenance services, including inspection, repair, replacement, and maintenance services on an “as and when requested” basis, for various types of kitchen equipment located at various locations in the Region.

**Service Scope:**

* Inspection of kitchen equipment
* Repair of kitchen equipment
* Replacement of kitchen equipment
* Maintenance of kitchen equipment

**Tender Requirements:**

* The successful bidder must meet the requirements outlined in the Standing Offer Agreement.
* The successful bidder must maintain liability insurance adequate to cover all business activities.
* The successful bidder must comply with the relevant laws, standards and good industry practices.

**Appendix:** A list of kitchen locations is included in the Annex Statement of Requirement.

#### Important Dates
---------------------------------

* **Tender Closing Date:** August 24, 2023, at 14:00:00 (Local Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** March 31, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None

#### Evaluation Criteria
----------------------------

The tender will be awarded based on lowest Price. Other evaluation criteria as outlined in the Standing Offer document.         

____________________________________________________________________  ...End  __________________________________________________________________Ò¿ ...significance Concluded  ¿ . ______________________________________________________

**Note for Tenderers:**

* All tenderers must carefully review the Standing Offer Agreement and the terms
